name: black-candy
description: BlackCandy is a self-hosted music streaming server that works with your personal music library. It provides multi-user support, playlist management, and a friendly web UI, making it a lightweight music streaming alternative.
features: Music Streaming: Stream your personal music library from anywhere. Your music, everywhere.
Multi-User Support: Create accounts for family and friends. Share your library.
Playlist Management: Create and organize playlists across devices. Curate your music.
Web Interface: Clean, responsive UI works on all devices. Beautiful player.
Library Organization: Automatic organization by artist, album, and genre. Smart cataloging.
Search Functionality: Find songs, albums, and artists instantly. Quick discovery.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient streaming. Fast performance.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your music collection. Privacy guaranteed.
